example.text: President Biden’s shameful open borders policies have led to an unprecedented surge of illegal immigrants and drugs into our communities. [[url]]

This bill we are voting on today to declassify information on the origins of the COVID-19 virus will provide much-needed transparency for Americans who have lost so much in this tragedy, but it is only a start. I look forward to continuing to work with my colleagues on both sides of the aisle in this endeavor.
I voted for the Secure the Border Act to close border loopholes, provide security for our nation, and stop the flow of illicit fentanyl into our communities.
President Biden’s shameful open borders policies have led to an unprecedented surge of illegal immigrants and drugs into our communities. [[url]]

"For too long, US policy has failed to recognize the economic threat China poses to domestic industries or how its domination of particular markets creates a national security challenge. We cannot afford to continue this blindness." Click here to read my latest: [[url]]
